The power and convenience of the Moonpanda desktop app can now be accessed from anywhere on the web! No more interruptions — easily switch between tasks and accurately log time with the integrated task timer!   

🚀 Key Features:

Universal Task Management:
Manage and complete tasks directly from any browser window for ultimate convenience.
Search tasks effortlessly within the extension.

Real-Time Collaboration:
Edit task statuses, and leave comments—all within the Chrome extension.
Easily collaborate and communicate among team members without leaving your workflow.

Task Timer:
Start and stop task timers to track project progress and time spent efficiently.
Accurately log billable hours directly from your browser.

Cohesive Experience:
Enjoy a seamless and cohesive experience as all data is instantly mirrored between the Chrome extension and the web app.
Eliminate the need for constant switching between tools; stay focused on your projects and tasks.

🌐 Instant Data Sync:
Experience real-time synchronization between the Chrome extension and the web app.
Changes made in the extension are reflected instantly in the web app, ensuring data consistency.

🎯 Benefits:
Boost productivity with an all-in-one project management solution.
Streamline your workflow by managing tasks and collaborating without disruptions.
Enhance accuracy with precise task timing and seamless data synchronization.

👩‍💼 Target Audience:
Architects and architectural teams seeking an efficient and integrated project management solution.
Professionals who value a cohesive experience between their browser and project management tools.

🌟 Why Moonpanda:
Tailored for architects, Moonpanda provides a specialized and streamlined project management experience.
Unleash the full potential of your browser with a feature-rich Chrome extension that complements the power of the web app.
📈 Elevate your architectural project management with Moonpanda's Chrome extension. Download now for a seamless and productive workflow!
